about_me_paragraph_1: I spend most of my time building web apps, messing with AI, and sometimes breaking infra (I fix it tho). TypeScript is my main thing, Rust when I feel like it, and anything LLMs or Transformers related. Cloud stuff? I gotchu. Currently working on the [Mercor Work Platform](https://work.mercor.com).
about_me_paragraph_2: Outside of code, I'm usually [thinking](/thinking) about random stuff that somehow always ends up as excalidraws. Big fan of video games and [sumika](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sumika). Currently on my first playthrough of [FFVI](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Final_Fantasy_VI).
contact_description: Wanna chat? Hit me up on [Whatsapp](https://wa.me/919744375687?text=hii) or [Discord]{COPY:notalen}. You could also go the formal route with [email](mailto:alenyohannan71@gmail.com) or [schedule a meeting](/meeting) if that's more your style.
meta_description: Engineer, developer and creator of cool stuff
